summary: The client confirmed a negative response to an unspecified query, while the SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT reported a failed HTTP POST request to the local sprints API due to a method not allowed error.

risks.risk: HTTP POST to /api/sprints endpoint returns 405 Method Not Allowed, indicating potential API misconfiguration or incorrect endpoint usage.
risks.mitigation: Verify the API endpoint supports POST method and check server configuration.
